secondaries.shortDescription: During Resolve Pre-battle Abilities, select one PRIMARCH or SUPREME COMMANDER from your opponent's army (or the highest point if neither is there). Score 5 if destroyed, 5 more if melee from ADEPTUS CUSTODES or ANATHEMA PSYKANA, 5 if both are true

subObjectives.description: Targeted opponent's unit is destroyed by a melee attack from an ADEPTUS CUSTODES or ANATHEMA PSYKANA

secondaries.shortDescription: End of battle round, score 4 if 1+ enemy were destroyed by ADEPTUS CUSTODES unit AND none of your ADEPTUS CUSTODES were destroyed

subObjectives.description: 1+ ennemy units were destroyed AND no ADEPTUS CUSTODES were destroyed

secondaries.shortDescription: At the end of the battle round, score 3 if you controle more objectives not within either player deployment zone

subObjectives.description: Control more `no man land`objectives than the opponent
